channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The U.N. utters the word: Dementia
item.description: For the first time, the United Nations has issued a political declaration pledging to address dementia. Will it make a difference?

item.title: Latest update of 1844 American songbook reflects new generation of 'Sacred Harp' singers
